title: HOUR 2: Luka or Giannis?
itunes:title: HOUR 2: Luka or Giannis?
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre talk about Bill Belichick contemplating the idea of placing Cam Newton in a ‘platoon’ system where he will have limited snaps among another quarterback. The guys share which top-tier NBA team they are most concerned about in the opening round. Plus, they discuss players pointing blame at ‘the bubble’ for their struggles and debate if they’d prefer to start a franchise with Luka or Giannis! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
